entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 70 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
